io_value.val:
Registers are:
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 The following commands are acceptable: 100 - halts and quits 2dn - Sets register d to n. Example 234 3dn - Add n to register d 4dn - Multiply register d by n Example 459 5dn - Print register d. Sample 59 6 output.txt - Get the next argument containing the filename to import. The file contains values to set the registers to. 7 d n - Print from register d to register n. Make sure you include spaces between the start and end indexes.Sample 7 5 9
Command: 6 Set up register from file in.txt Contents: 10 5 3 4 50 500 20 89 99 100
Command: 7 Print registers 0 - 9
Output saved to output.txt
